greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = (3*n+7)!!!/7!!!, related to A007559(n+1) ((3*n+1)!!! triple factorials).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..378
mathematica: With[{nn = 30}, CoefficientList[Series[1/(1 - 3*x)^(10/3), {x, 0, nn}], x]*Range[0, nn]!] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Aug 15 2018 *)
program: (MAGMA) m:=30; R<x>:=PowerSeriesRing(Rationals(), m); b:=Coefficients(R!(1/(1-3*x)^(10/3))); [Factorial(n-1)*b[n]: n in [1..m]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Aug 15 2018
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_
